data.name: This is a Ghost
data.detailed_description:
This is a Ghost is a surnatural investigation game. You are a member of a secret society that hunts or sets free scary entities from our world.

  • Start your investigation with a set of tools to find clues to a haunting.
  • 45 possibilities ! 15 entities with unique characteristics and 3 associated behaviours. Will you succeed in your contract ?
  • Find out more about the entity by conducting your survey and complete your contract.
  • Destroy the threat or release the haunting from this world.
  • Increase your reputation among secret societies and unlock new contracts.

In progress

  • Mode online co-op
  • Adding new maps
  • Adding new equipment
  • Support for the controller
  • Translation into many languages

I am developing this horrific investigation game on my own. I thank you for your participation in the community.
